content: हि {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} (Never used at the beginning of a sentence) It has the following senses:-- {@--1@} For, because (expressing a strict or logical reason); अग्निरिहास्ति धूमो हि दृश्यते <ls>G. M.</ls>; <ls>R. 5. 10.</ls> {@--2@} Indeed, surely; देव प्रयोगप्रधानं हि नाट्यशास्त्रं <ls>M. 1</ls>; न हि कमलिनीं दृष्ठ्वा ग्राहमवेक्षते मतंगजः <ls>M. 3.</ls> {@--3@} For instance, as is well known; प्रजानामेव भूत्यर्थं स ताभ्यो बलिमग्रहीत् . सहस्रगुणमुत्स्रष्टुमादत्ते हि रसं रविः <ls>R. 1. 18.</ls> {@--4@} Only, alone (to emphasize an idea); मूढो हि मदनेनायास्यते <ls>K. 155.</ls> {@--5@} Sometimes it is used merely as an expletive.

हि {c5c} <ab>P.</ab> (हिनोति, हित; {%<ab>caus.</ab>%} हाययति; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} जिघीषति) {@--1@} To send forth, impel. {@--2@} To cast, throw, discharge, shoot; गदा शक्रजिता जिघ्ये <ls>Bk. 14. 36.</ls> {@--3@} To excite, incite, urge. {@--4@} To promote, further. {@--5@} To gratify, please, exhilarate. {@--6@} To go or proceed.
